intro: Psychotria oubatchensis, commonly known as the Oubatch's psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It produces small, round berries that are typically red when mature. Psychotria oubatchensis is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth.
